Hands-Free Controls
Hands-Free Controls is a mouse emulator based on your facial movements, tracking your face using the front camera.

 Hands-Free Controls
 Developed by Victor Arsjad
 001201400063
 President University
 Faculty of Computing
 ]> Opening accessibility settings.

Please enable accessibility for the program:

Settings > Accessibility > Hands-Free Controls

and then switch on the Hands-Free Controls accessibility service Done
Back button Home button Recents button Notifications button Expand/collapse dock menu Open keyboard Toggle pointer Context Menu Toggle Rest mode. To disable automatic clicks while you read or watch a video, for instance.
